lead_paragraph: Defenders of the change to the law say it protects the rights of parents to discipline their children, but critics say it is a license for violent behavior.
snippet: Defenders of the change to the law say it protects the rights of parents to discipline their children, but critics say it is a license for violent behavior....

headline.main: Russia Moves to Soften Domestic Violence Law
headline.print_headline: Russia Moves to Soften Domestic Violence Law
